summary: Story of a feud that has gone on between two Irish families for more than 50 years.

Kennedy|Julia Lockwood|Pat McGrath|Nita Moyce|Jim O'Brady|Desmond O'Neill|James Robertson Justice|Rhona Sykes|Richard Thomas|Rosemary Treston|Richard West|Dennis Wyndham
title: Hungry Hill
